attributes.action: remove Jacqui Smith as Home Secretary from the current Labour Party Cabinet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Home Secretary, Jacqui Smith poses particularly significant risk in the UK to both security and public liberties. Her indecisiveness upon many issues from terrorist detentions to Ian Blair, has been an unsettling experience for a British public, who truly require a straight speaking individual, committed to their every word. We the undersigned do not have confidence in Jacqui Smith as Home Secretary.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
